name: N-SFW.COM SDS
description:
The N-SFW.COM plugin is an innovative extension for your Mue that automatically creates background images from the anime: Seven Deadly Sins from the N-SFW.COM platform. With an impressive collection of high-quality images, this plugin transforms your Mue into a visual experience and provides constantly changing, appealing backgrounds.

---

Notice:
This photo pack uses a third-party API (https://n-sfw.com) to dynamically serve a different image on every page load.
As thousands of images from N-SFW.COM appear to Mue as a single image, some features (such as favourite background) will not work as expected.
The Mue Team does not control and is not responsible for the content served remotely.
While only "safe" images are supposed to be served, the Mue Team cannot guarantee every image will be appropriate for all users.
Please direct any suggestions, complaints, or other queries to N-SFW.COM support, support@max.srl.
N-SFW.COM Privacy Policy: https://max.srl/impressum-datenschutz.html
author: MaximilianGT500
